Item.Name: Authentic GUCCI LOGO Blk Bag NEW & NoReserve!

Bidder.Location: CHECK OUT ALL MY AUCTIONS! Happy Holidays!

Item.Description: The HOTTEST Gucci bag on eBay! Unfortunately, there is a lot of fake Gucci on ebay. This bag is not one of them. How can you tell the difference? The name _Gucci_ should be engraved on all metal hardware including snaps, buckles and metal handle attachments. There should also be a Gucci serial code under the leather label on the interior. Fabric and leather should be solid, durable, and of the highest quality. An eBay description which says the bag has a Gucci label but fails to say it is authentic is a warning sign that it might be a counterfeit item. Whether or not you decide to buy here, beware of any auction or seller who cannot guarantee authenticity! The quality of the fakes is not nearly the same as the real thing. There are few fashion designers who have been as influential as Gucci. They have remained at the very top of the fashion world for decades, and consistently set the pace for the rest of the pack. This 100% authentic Gucci purse shows why many fashion aficionados are willing to spend a few week_s salary to own a Gucci item. It is made of jet black fabric subtly embossed with Gucci_s famous crossed _GG_ logo. It is trimmed and detailed with black leather, and has a single black leather strap in that in-between size that lets you choose between wearing it off your shoulder or carrying it as a tote. The roomy interior has a single internal zippered compartment, and the bag snaps sharply shut via an internal magnetic strap Absolutely fabulous! The bag measures 11.5" inches accross the bottom tapering up to 9.5" at the top. It stands 10" tall, and the strap measures 22" long including the hardware. _Gucci, Made in Italy_ is engraved in the handsome silver metal attachments which hold the strap, on the magnetic snap which closes the bag, and on the leather tag on the interior. There is a Gucci serial number under the tag. _Gucci_ is also embossed on the leather zipper pull which closes the internal compartment. This 100% authentic bag is direct from Saks Fifth Avenue, where it was used briefly as display model on a mannequin. It is in brand new condition and has never been worn. This fabulous bag retails for over $550. With a $10 starting bid and no reserve, this is a real steal that you don_t want to miss! Direct from Saks Fifth Avenue to you for a fraction of the cost! Each month I list dozens of shoes, bags and accessories that were used briefly as floor models or were returns to Saks Fifth Avenue. These items have little or no wear. They are all guaranteed authentic, and are all from the very top designers. Some still have the original Saks labels on them. Unless otherwise mentioned, they do not come with boxes or dust bags. None were originally priced lower than $150, some sell for more than $600. Most of my auctions will begin below $50 with NO RESERVE. I put up new items all the time, so check my auctions frequently, and most of all, HAVE FUN! MY TERMS: Domestic shipping/handling for this item will be $6.00. International shipping rates will vary. All purchases must be paid for in US dollars. I cannot accept returns on clothing or shoes. I am not responsible if a shoe does not fit. I list the brand and the size and it is your responsibility to know if you can wear this brand in this size. I am happy to provide any measurements you request before you bid. Misrepresented items will be accepted back if returned to me within ten days of receipt. Postal insurance is extra and mandatory on all domestic purchases over $50. If payment is not received within ten days, I reserve the right to cancel the transaction and relist the item. I accept credit cards and checks through Paypal and Bidpay; money orders; and personal checks with a 10 day hold. Created with Sonny! _ at BayPal Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Item.Description: HOT WHEELS SHIFT KICKERS 'COOKIN' CAPRI' - MIP It seems every year Hot Wheels would introduce a new series of cars and trucks with the latest gimmick for those who wanted something more than a regular die cast car. This week I've got a few examples of these models. This auction is for a Shift Kicker 'Cookin' Capri'. This one is mint in it's original package. It's based on an early 80s Mercury Capri. It was made in Hong Kong. There is a stick shift sticking out the rear window. As it says on the package 'Rev it up! Pop it in gear! Watch it peel out!' An interesting addition to your collection from around 1982/83. Die-cast metal with rubber Goodyear racing tires, it measures about 3 inches long. Please see the photo above. Item.Name: HOT CUSTOM HANDMADE SUEDE WESTERN BOOTS 10.5
Item.Description: Here is a cool pair of jet black suede or roughout cowboy boots in a size 10.5. I'm assuming the width is EE because they are a little too loose for me. The numbers printed inside the boots are 105 3 378. There is a label inside the shafts that say "LA # 1 Billy Boots". The shafts have 4 rows of subtle stitching. The bull-doggin' heels are 2 inches high and have "Billy Boots-Handmade" imprinted on their bottoms. The toes are pointed with the soles squared at the tips, there is a stitched "toe-bug" on the tops. The soles and heels are in like new condition, looks like they were worn maybe 4 times. The boot is all leather, except for the lining of the foot, which is a fleece/flannel material; because of this, I think this would make a GREAT boot for the Winter months. There are a few minor cosmetic problems with these boots: Firstly, there are a few minor cracks in the piping that goes up the sides of the boots-nothing that a black marker wouldn't fix. Secondly, there is a minor stain above the heel area on the right boot-NOT driver rub, the leather on these is in good condition. Overall, a really HOT looking pair of winter kickers. If you have any questions, please e-mail me before you bid, as sale is final. Buyer to pay actual shipping (@$10 to USA). I ONLY accept USPS money-orders or BidPay & payment must be made within 7 days of auction end. THANKS FOR LOOKING!!!

Item.Description: This is another really super licensed t-shirt, based on the J.K. Rowling Harry Potter books (I have many more styles and sizes of shirts listed this week)...what a super surprise for Christmas! It is boy's size Large/L or 12/14, but it would be appropriate for a BOY OR GIRL, and younger children could wear it as a baggy shirt or sleep shirt, as well. It is a comfortable 100% cotton, navy blue (a rich, dark shade like midnight blue) with a really neat 3-D design of the word 'Quidditch' in gold lightning lettering, with gold stars above the I's in 'Quidditch'. The letters are lightly shadowed, giving them a deeper 3-D effect. On the left side there is a matching lightning bolt design with the name 'Harry Potter' at the tip. The details and colors of this shirt are terrific, and your Harry Potter fan will feel like a Quidditch star wearing it! All of the Harry shirts I have listed have some growing room in them as they tend to run a bit large. Kids love Harry Potter, and they'll love this shirt! It would be a super surprise for any occasion. Like all of my items this is brand new with original tags (these come with a Harry Potter bookmark tag) and from a nonsmoking home. Other than the normal scuff on the underside of the shoe that happens in no time at all from being worn outside, the visible, upper tops of my shoes must be very eye-pleasing with no bad flaws or outrageously major scuffs or ugly stains! What I want is for you to be delighted when you see your shoes, not disappointed! Since shipping cost is always a factor on Ebay, look at all of my shoe auctions and see if you might like some others and save on combined shipping if you bid and win any other shoes from my other auctions. Now you can use your cell phone in elevators, car, boat, mountain, tunnel, buildings and more..... It's like having a four foot antenna on your phone. Retails for $19.99 Features: Brand new on the market. Works on any mobile phone. Works on analog, digital and tri-band phones. Reduce static on analog and digital phones. Remove the Internal Booster Antenna from plastic. Remove cell phone battery and adhere the Internal Booster Antenna onto your phone. Replace battery and turn your cell phone on. That's it! Item.Description: CANON EF 35-70mm 3 Size: 8 Brand: Rush Hour Express Upper: Black Patent with Gold-tone adornments Heel: 3 1/2" Sole: Synthetic Condition: New-Never worn Defects: None Other: A Picture Says a Thousand Words, Doesn_t It? PLEASE READ: If you love high-fashioned heels, then do I have the auctions for you . Over the next few weeks I will be parting with most of my gorgeous high-heel collection. I presently have over 500 pair of the most gorgeous high-heeled shoes that can be found anywhere. You see during the 80_s and early 90_s I was a sought after model and performer, and if I saw a style of shoe that I really liked, I would buy 1 in every color made. So many of the shoes will be available in m a n y c o l o r s . My foot had gotten a little larger as a progressed through my 20_s so many shoes will be size from size 8 to 9.5 (most being 8.5 and 9_s).Most were NEVER EVEN WORN? Brand Names include "W*ld Pair", "Pr*xy", "9-W*st","C*ndies","S*cha London", "Pr*vate Collection", "Sp*nish Leather", "P*lizzio", "J*zz", "Pr*via", "All*re", "K*rin Morgan" ,"M*inframe", "C*lvin Klein", "SR*", "Ch*ndlers","Fr*dericks of Hollyw**d", "Car*ssa", "Sergi* V*lente", "B*re Traps", "Vict*ria_s S*cret", "Z*diak", "Ann* Kl*in II" and many others. It breaks my heart to part with these lovely shoes. But they don_t fit me now, and I don_t foresee my foot getting any smaller in the future. ( thanks to my lovely 17 year old foot models Lisa T (cassidy), Michelle (roche), and Sarah (the princess) who without their help would never have gotten these all on Ebay) Please watch all my auctions over the next several weeks (click on " view seller_s other auctions ") under my Ebay ID at the top of this page. I pulled some of the shoes that were either "Extreme" or "Holiday Fashion" so that they could be bought in time for the Holidays. After that I will auction my "Fall/Winter" collection and finally my "Spring/Summer" (watch for my collection of C*ndies vintage slides in about 8 different colors) Some of the auctions will show several shoes (same style/different colors)- winning bidder will get to choose their color- If they want MORE than 1 color or ALL the colors, please let me know at auction end so that we make work out a special price for additional color(s). I want you to be COMPLETELY satisfied with your purchase. I have FLAWLESS FEEDBACK and am determined to keep it that way. I want repeat and multiple purchase customers. I will work with you on additional pairs for price/shipping. I am not interested in gouging you on add_l shipping _ If I can fit them in the box and it doesn_t cost ME anymore- It won_t cost YOU anymore. I will try to accurately describe each pair in terms of construction/condition. The last thing I want is a disappointed customer _ Shipping with Delivery Confirmation is $5 add $1 for Insurance (recommended) Payment via PayPal (sapone@lm.com) , Billpoint (ten_toes) or Money Order. _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ Free Honesty Counters powered by Andale! Item.Name: SEXY $168 ROYAL BLUE BRIDAL Formal JESSICA 9
Item.Description: SEXY $168 ROYAL BLUE BRIDAL Formal JESSICA 9/10. This is a Gorgeous and SEXY ROYAL BLUE BRIDAL Formal with RHINESTONES across the top of the bodice and Royal Blue Satin Spaghetti Straps that attach to the top of the Bodice in front and back. The Dress is Royal Blue with a Corset Style Bodice. The Dress is cut in almost straight across and moderately low in front and lower and scooped in back to just above the mid back. The back and shoulders are completely bare except for the spaghetti straps. The Dress is fitted to the hips using 5 seams in front and 4 seams with staves sewn in in the front, sides and back seams. At the bottom of each Seam is a box pleat. there are pockets in each side seam instead of box pleats. The Dress is fitted to the waist and flares from the waist to 112" circumference at the hem. This Formal and/or Party Hostess Dress is from the JESSICA McCLINTOCK Formals Collection. The Dress is Royal Blue and has a 14" long hidden center back zipper. The Dress Shell is 100% polyester and lined in 100% Acetate. Dry Clean Only. The skirt is very full including the acetate lining comes to the hip area where a 28" strip of black gathered netting is attached to add fullness to the skirt. The dress is marked size 9/10 and the measurements are: Bust 34", Waist 28", Length 59". The Dress hangs, drapes and flows beautifully. It looks great and sparkles under the lights and especially with movement. RETAIL: $168. This sensational Formal or Evening Dress is BRAND NEW , and never worn. This Gorgeous Dress would be absolutely perfect for PROM, a Formal Evening out, or even a Luxury Cruise.
